document.full_text: the euro zone edged closer on wednesday to a compromise on a second greek bailout package under which private creditors would be asked to swap their sovereign debt holdings for bonds with longer maturities.
document.title: europe eyes private sector role in greek debt deal
lines_and_colors: the euro zone edged closer on wednesday to a compromise on a second greek bailout package under which private creditors would be asked to swap their sovereign debt holdings for bonds with longer maturities.
